name: An RPG in Black and White (DEMO)
name_original: An RPG in Black and White (DEMO)
description:
FOR THE 30 DAY RPG MAKER JAM

Mono, tired of all the boring lives of the black and white village, wants some change, and he's going to get it, he prays at the church and gets his butt out of there, but he gets caught.

Get 2 teammates to help you stop any forces in your way.

this demo is half complete.

music by: https://lean56.itch.io/
